trade_signal_metadata.name: Sunset Surge Forex Breakout Strategy
trade_signal_metadata.desc: The Sunset Surge Forex Breakout Strategy is designed to exploit the unique price movements during late trading hours in the Forex market, particularly focusing on volatility breakouts. By employing a combination of price action and volatility indicators, this algorithm identifies optimal entry and exit points to maximize short-term profits as the market transitions into less active periods.
